faqs.a: Rates vary by season. For live pricing & availability, visit https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book. You can also send an inquiry from the same page.

faqs.q: What taxes apply and at what percentage?
faqs.a: Total tax is 13%: Sales tax 7% (Florida 6% + Okaloosa 1%) + Tourist Development Tax 6% (Okaloosa).

faqs.q: Is travel insurance available or recommended? Through whom?
faqs.a: Yes—travel insurance is offered at checkout via Play Travel Protection. We encourage all guests to consider it.

faqs.q: Do you require a damage deposit or hold? How much and when is it released?
faqs.a: Yes—$300 damage hold, released within 48 hours after checkout pending inspection.

faqs.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.a: Major credit cards only (no ACH, PayPal, or Zelle). This is the most secure option for both parties.

faqs.q: Can I modify or extend a reservation after booking?
faqs.a: Usually yes—subject to calendar availability and any rate differences. Please reach out.
Weekly and monthly discounts depend on season. See https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book or send an inquiry.

faqs.q: Are there any blackout dates or minimum night requirements?
faqs.a: 3-night minimum. Peak/holiday dates may have additional restrictions. If unsure, please send an inquiry from https://www.destincondogetaways.com/book.
